trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Margate
There were no other sightings in Margate on or around February 18th 2011
divs: sighting detailson the way back from a call while working on duty with the *(possible identifying info about the witness removed--cms\sg) i witnessed a bright object out west that was moving very slowly. when i pulled back into station i took out my video camera to record the object. the object was out west possibly over coral springs or the everglades it moved very slowly untill it finally disappeared behind some buildings. i am also a mufon investigator.
Summary: witnessed ufo on way back from call
